title: Solution1. We Built our business on great customer service
subTitle: At the beginning at least, but then we realized we could make a lot more money if we kinda stopped caring about that. Our new strategy is to write a bunch of things that look really good in the headlines, then clarify in the small print but hope people don't actually read it.

advantage.title: Free Shipping
advantage.subTitle: It's not actually free we just price it into the products.Someone's paying for it, and it's not us

advantage.title: 10-year warranty
advantage.subTitle: If it breaks in the first 10 years we'll replace it. After that you're on your own though

advantage.title: Exchanges
advantage.subTitle: If you don't like it, trade it to one of your friends for something of theirs. Don't send it here though.

title: Solution2. Two-way communication is possible through real-time satellite communication
subTitle: Due to two-way communication, it is possible to determine the state of the real-time satellite, the location of the ship, and whether it is normal or abnormal, such as data reception.

title: Solution3. Receive data by providing industrial IoT solutions
subTitle: Industrial IoT solutions provided by Korea ofCom provide solutions suitable for various industries such as construction equipment monitoring, marine information monitoring, and climate information monitoring.
